ng.co.ovo.Multimedia

Class FullVideoFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • ng.co.ovo.Multimedia.FullVideoFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class FullVideoFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Author:
    ovokerie creates the windows that reads video files and the associated icons. The icons are represented by labels and their listeners are added and implemented The external library used is the VLCJ library which is open source.
    See Also:
